English: extracting the soul of the dead
realizing that all chest are mimics
waiting for the goop to move
Learning the dark ways of magic
Putting Rope on location (or any harvestable) will trap animals
Use a Rope and Raw Meat on a Forest (or any location that has bears in it) to guarantee getting a bear
Use a Rope and Seaweed on a Plains or a Jungle or a Forest (or any location that has Giant Snails in it) to guarantee getting a Giant Snail
Use a Rope and Villager on a Spring or a Well to guarantee getting a Mosquito
Use a Rope and Goop on a Forest (or any location that has Rats in it) to guarantee getting a Rat
Use a Rope and Raw Fish on a Spring (or any location that has Seagulls in it) to guarantee getting a Seagull
Use a Rope and Rabbit on a Jungle (or any location that has Snakes in it) to guarantee getting a Snake
Use a Rope and Bone on a Forest (or any location that has Wolfs in it) to guarantee getting a Wolf
Use a Rope and Carrot on a Berry Bush (or any location that has Rabbits in it) to guarantee getting a Rabbit
Use a Rope and Gold Bar on a Forest (or any location that has Goblins in it) to guarantee getting a Goblin
Use a Rope and Cow or Sheep on a Forest (or any location that has Ogres in it) to guarantee getting a Ogre
Use a Rope and Corpse on a Old Village (or any location that has Orc Wizards in it) to guarantee getting a Orc Wizard
Use a Rope and Banana on a Jungle (or any location that has Monkeys in it) to guarantee getting a Monkey
Use a Rope and Milk on a Forest (or any location that has Feral Cats in it) to guarantee getting a Feral Cat
Use a Rope and Chicken on a Jungle (or any location that has Tigers in it) to guarantee getting a Tiger
Use a Rope and Milkshake on a Spring or a Well to guarantee getting a Merman
Use a Rope and Bottle of Water on a Catacomb (or any location that has Frog Mans in it) to guarantee getting a Frog Man
